messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Witchcraft type play was:spectrumkids, rage,  unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... It s great he gets that kind of support from you. ... I hope so, too.  I know plenty of Pagans who stop attending family events in churches because their
messages.messageBody:
> Michael reads a lot and he is a very private person. I hope he
>does find what he is looking for. Whether it is my held belief or not. He's
>the only one that knows his heart.

It's great he gets that kind of support from you.

> You asked someone else if they would go to different rituals. Well I'd
>feel honored to join in something so personal and intimate. I hope my
>children continue to trust and share with me all these thing they discover
>fascinating and that speaks to their heart.

I hope so, too. I know plenty of Pagans who stop attending family events in
churches because their experience with religion at home was so horrible.
It's sad.

> The way I see this is that I really don't have much to do with it. God
>is the only one that can speak to our hearts. It's a personal relationship.
>I can explain my faith in the ways I beleive but my children have to make
up
>their own mind.

If you'll forgive me, Amen sister! -smile-

>I hope that may have answered you question even though it wasn't really
>directed at me.

Yes, thank you.

Kelly
